crm_notes.notes: Prospect interested in payment solutions. Unknown authority level. Low urgency.

follow_up_email.subject: Razorpay solutions for your company - Next steps
follow_up_email.body:
Hi there,

Thank you for taking the time to speak with me today about your company's payment solutions needs. I'm excited about the opportunity to help you with business growth and revenue optimization.

Based on our conversation, I believe Razorpay's solutions align perfectly with your requirements. Our platform has helped similar companies achieve significant improvements in payment success rates and customer experience.

Next steps:
- I'll send you relevant case studies from companies in your industry
- Our technical team will prepare a customized demo
- We'll provide detailed pricing based on your expected volume

Feel free to reply with any questions, or discuss how we can accelerate your growth.

Best regards,
Priya
Sales Development Representative
Razorpay

sales_summary: Thanks ! I'll make sure your company gets the right information. Our team will follow up on the follow up within 24 hours.
recommended_action: COLD LEAD - Send nurture content, follow up in 1 week
